From: Robin Kirkman <robin@...>

Recieving no reply, VorbIss transformed to beast mode, and started running 
south, heading unwittingly toward the maximal base.

On Monday 20 August 2001 22:05, Robin Kirkman wrote:
> I put VorbIss's description at the end of this message, since it isn't
> visible on the group web page yet.
> -----------------
>
> ::VorbIss::

<-- snip -->

> Vorb walked over to the pod, and plugged into the emergency auxilliary
> power to recharge himself, then grabbed an empty power cell, for filling up
> later. "I must find allies", he thought.
>
> Over his radio, Vorb began to broadcast. "Attention all protoforms. We are
> Vorb and Iss, poly-intelligent robot form. Henceforth we will refer to
> ourself in singular as VorbIss. I require information about what factions
> exist on this planet. Please reply."

<-- snip -->
